name: Vegan Tomato Egg Stir-Fry (番茄炒蛋)
description: Tomato egg stir-fry, the ultimate Taiwanese comfort food, vegan-ized: light, airy tofu pockets paired with tart, tangy tomatoes. A version that does the original dish justice.
recipeIngredient: 3 pieces (50 grams) abura-age, or Japanese fried tofu pouch
1/8 teaspoon black salt (kala namak) or regular sea salt

recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the Tomato Sauce. First, remove the stem. Slice the tomato in into quarters, then slice each quarter into 2-3 chunks. In a non-stick pan, heat up a little vegetable oil on medium heat. Add the tomatoes, followed by 1/4 cup of water. Bring water to boil and cook to slightly soften the tomatoes, around 2 minutes. Add in the ketchup, then add the cornstarch slurry (thickening agent) to thicken. Turn down the heat and keep warm aside.
recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the Tomato Sauce. First, remove the stem. Slice the tomato in into quarters, then slice each quarter into 2-3 chunks. In a non-stick pan, heat up a little vegetable oil on medium heat. Add the tomatoes, followed by 1/4 cup of water. Bring water to boil and cook to slightly soften the tomatoes, around 2 minutes. Add in the ketchup, then add the cornstarch slurry (thickening agent) to thicken. Turn down the heat and keep warm aside.

recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the Tofu Pouches. Use your hands to tear tofu pouches into large chunks.  In a separate bowl, combine 3 tablespoons of water, turmeric, and black salt (or regular salt). Heat up a lightly greased non-stick pan on medium heat and add the torn tofu pouches. Add turmeric water and cook tofu pouches until all liquid evaporates.
recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the Tofu Pouches. Use your hands to tear tofu pouches into large chunks.  In a separate bowl, combine 3 tablespoons of water, turmeric, and black salt (or regular salt). Heat up a lightly greased non-stick pan on medium heat and add the torn tofu pouches. Add turmeric water and cook tofu pouches until all liquid evaporates.

recipeInstructions.name: To Finish. Add cooked tofu pouches to tomato sauce and gently combine. Sprinkle with scallions and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.text: To Finish. Add cooked tofu pouches to tomato sauce and gently combine. Sprinkle with scallions and serve immediately.
